name: Interworlds Academy
detailed_description:
The world, that's hidden from view of common people. The world, that lost on the border between life and death... The "Interworld" Academy is the place where people's lost souls find themselves looking for their true goals.

This story is about a character who falls into a mysterious academy by accident. He have to solve the mystery and its secrets, help the inhabitants of the academy with their problems and, perhaps, find love. And by the way, about that case ... Is it true what they say, that everything in life is purposefully?..

Game features:
- More than 180 000 words, which help you to be wrapped up in this magic story completely.
- A dialog system, in which your choices have an impact on the plot of the game.
- An ability to create a background to your character during the game.
- Potion-making and participating in song writing ... Feel yourself a creator!
- Each girl has her own ending and that depends on how you communicate with them.

short_description: What will you do if you get into another world? I mean into this kind of "Interworlds". Into this mysterious academy in the middle of nowhere...on the border between life and death. Can you get out of there and save the rest?.. Only time will tell us.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains strong language, description of sexual acts and nudity.
